titleStmt.title: The ansvvere of a mother vnto hir seduced sonnes letter
titleStmt.author: Madd., I. aut

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from STC.
The initials 'Ez.' and 'W.' are at the sides of a block of type ornament on the title page.
Includes, with caption title, "A letter written from Doway 6. of March 1627. by a seduced sonne vnto his mother" signed: I. Madd.
Identified as STC 657 on UMI microfilm reel 641.
Reproductions of the originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library (identified as STC 657) and in the Cambridge University Library.
Appears at reel 641 (Folger Shakespeare Library copy), and at reel 1087 (Cambridge University Library copy).
